name: Staff Sales
query:
select 
si.posting_date as "Date:date:100",
si.name as "Invoice Reference:Link/Sales Invoice:100",
sit.booking_no as "Booking#:Data:100",
sit.traveler_name_cf as "Traveler Name:Data:100",
si.contact_mobile as "Phone:Data:80",
sit.from_cf as "From:Data:100",
sit.to_cf as "To:Data:100",
sit.travel_date_cf as "TravelDate:date:100",
sit.return_date_cf as "ReturnDate:date:100",
sit.airline_cf as "Airline:Data:120",
sit.city_cf as "City:Data:100",
sit.hotel_cf as "Hotel:Data:120",
sit.supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:120",
sit.confirmation_number_cf as "Confirmation Number:Data:100",
sit.reservation_policy_cf as "Reservation Policy:Data:100",
coalesce(sip.mode_of_payment, pe.mode_of_payment) as "Payment:Data:100",
sit.base_net_amount as "Selling Price:Currency:100",
sit.tour_amount_cf as "TourCode:Currency:100",
pur.base_net_amount as "Purchase Rate:Currency:100",
sit.base_net_amount - pur.base_net_amount as "Profit:Currency:100",
(sit.base_net_amount - pur.base_net_amount)*100 / sit.base_net_amount as "Profit Percent:Percent:80",
si.commission_rate * (sit.base_net_amount - pur.base_net_amount)/100 as "Salesman Commission:Currency:120",
si.sales_partner as "Sales Partner:Link/Sales Partner:120"
from `tabSales Invoice`as si 
inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` as sit on si.name = sit.parent and si.docstatus = 1
and sit.booking_no is not null
left outer join
(
 select pi.is_return , pit.base_net_amount, pit.booking_no
 from `tabPurchase Invoice` pi 
 inner join `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pit on pit.parent = pi.name and pit.booking_no is not null
) pur on pur.booking_no = sit.booking_no and si.is_return = pur.is_return
left outer join (
	select parent, group_concat(distinct mode_of_payment) mode_of_payment
	from `tabSales Invoice Payment`  
	group by parent
) sip on sip.parent = si.name and si.is_pos = 1 and si.docstatus =1
left outer join 
(
	select reference_name, group_concat(distinct mode_of_payment) mode_of_payment
	from `tabPayment Entry` pe
	inner join `tabPayment Entry Reference` per on per.parent = pe.name and per.reference_doctype = 'Sales Invoice'
	and pe.docstatus =1 group by per.reference_name
) pe on pe.reference_name = si.name
where si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
order by si.posting_date desc, sit.booking_no, si.is_return
